settings.heading: Details
settings.content:
• Buildable design with approximately 21 blocks per figure
  • 14 movable joints for dynamic posing
  • Collector-friendly size (50x95mm) with display stand included
  • Genuine License Limited Edition
  • Diverse character selection including Ultraman Trigger, Tiga, Z, and villains
  • Interchangeable weapons and special effect parts
  • Premium materials with detailed paint applications

New Generation Legend features buildable figures from the latest Ultraman series. Focused on Ultraman Trigger and the 2022 TV show, each figure has 21 blocks and 14 articulation points for dynamic posing.

settings.heading: Shopping Tips
settings.content:
Complete Set Purchase: Each suprise figurine in the set is unique, ensuring a diverse collection without duplicates.

Single Suprise Purchase: Purchasing suprise figurines individually may result in receiving duplicate figures.

settings.heading: Shipping Terms
settings.content:
Orders in stock are usually shipped within the United State within 2-7 business days. A shipping confirmation email will be sent to the email address attached to the order once the order has shipped. 

Please Note: International shipping is not currently available.

settings.heading: Product Care
settings.content:
Suprise Rules:

  1. For individuals aged 9 and above, please purchase suprise products under the supervision of a guardian. Kids under the age of 9 are not advised to make purchases.
  2. The packaging for these products contains small parts; do not swallow them, and do not allow kids under 3 years of age to use these toys.
  3. Suprise products are unique and random. Once opened, they cannot be returned or exchanged.

settings.heading: Return
settings.content:
You can return your Blokees order within 30 days of receipt. Please make sure the collectibles you received are in unused condition with the tags and packaging intact. If you've opened the toy it can not be returned. Start your return by emailing us at service@blokees.com.. Upon receiving and inspecting your item, a refund will be processed within 10 business days according to the original method of payment.

Please Note:

  1. Custom items, sale goods, and gift cards are non-returnable.
  2. Blokees only supports company products sold from authorized sellers in the US and the company websites.

settings.heading: Help Center
settings.content: To contact Blokees' customer service department, please email service@blokees.com or fill out the form on the contact page.

settings.heading: Packaging Contents
settings.content:
Suprise Set Box Composition: 9 Ultraman Blokees Figures (may have one special figure)

  • Ultraman Figure x 9
  • Weapon Accessory / Poseable Gesture (depends on the Figures)
  • Display Stand x 9
  • Instruction Manual x 9

settings.text: With 1500w ebike conversion kit, Its affordability, and versatility, You can turn the bike you love electric at a fraction of the cost of an eBike, for all your all-terrain adventures.

settings.icon_2_text: Package Size: 72*72*120 mm (Single Box), 220*220*125 mm (Set Box)

settings.heading: Detail
settings.content:
Dive into the Transformers universe with Blokees Figures Galaxy Version 05 ONE! This collection brings the origins story to life with 9 iconic characters from the "Transformers: One" movie. Each figure features an impressive 20+ points of articulation, allowing for incredibly dynamic poses and endless play possibilities.

What makes this set truly special? First, the surprise factor - hunt for the rare metallic Optimus Prime, hidden at a 1:36 ratio! Plus, each character comes with interchangeable accessories and weapons, letting you customize your display or battle scenes.

We're constantly improving playability, with new features added in each iteration. Whether you're recreating movie moments or imagining new adventures, these highly detailed figures offer both hardcore fans and newcomers an exciting way to experience the birth of the Autobot-Decepticon conflict.

Each Single Suprise Contains:

  • Transformer Figure x 1
  • Weapon Accessory / Poseable Gesture (depends on the Figures)
  • Display Stand x 1
  • Instruction Manual x 1

Series Composition: 9 Transformers Blokees Figures (may have one special figure).

settings.block_text: Build authentic Ultraman heroes and villains with 21 interlocking blocks. This Genuine License Limited Edition combines construction fun with collectible action figures.
Recreate iconic battle scenes with highly poseable figures featuring 14 movable joints.

Featuring characters from the latest Ultraman Trigger series, including various forms of Trigger, Ultraman Tiga, Ultraman Z, and popular villains. Collect all 9 figures, with a chance to find a rare secret figure!
Customize your figures with interchangeable weapons like Circle Arms and Flash Blade. Add special effect parts to recreate signature moves and attacks for an immersive display.
Each figure measures 50x95mm, perfect for display. Comes with a character-specific stand and collectible ID card. Made with premium materials and detailed paint applications for an authentic look.

settings.heading: Radiant Giants: Heroes Assembled
settings.text: Limited edition figures with premium materials and authentic designs, 9 Trigger series characters, including a chance for a rare secret figure.

settings.title: Ultraman vs Monsters: The Battle is About to Begin!
settings.sub_title: Awesome Building, Instant Action, Build Awesome Figures, Summon Heroes in a Snap
settings.left_richtext_unit1:
• Two-color head: solid and clear ABS plastic for lifelike, see-through eyes
  • Solid ABS plastic chest armor with metallic accents and painted details
  • ABS plastic shoulder pads shaped like the real thing, with painted patterns
settings.right_richtext_unit1:
• Upper arms with bumps to attach shoulder pads
  • C-shaped hands to hold weapons and tools
settings.richtext_unit2:
• Bendable arms and legs with two joints for action poses
  • One-piece lower arms and legs made of ABS and POM plastic, easy to attach
settings.left_richtext_unit3:
• Innovative "jumpsuit collar" design concept
  • Separable lower jaw component
settings.right_richtext_unit3:

  • Individual modular design for claws and appendages

settings.title: Ultraman vs Monsters: The Battle is About to Begin!
settings.sub_title: Awesome Building, Instant Action, Build Awesome Figures, Summon Heroes in a Snap

settings.block_text: Official Ultraman merchandise featuring characters from the 2022 TV series. Each figure authenticated with premium packaging and collector cards.
Contains 9 surprise figures, each with its own display stand. Exciting 1:27 chance to discover the coveted secret character!
21 high-quality ABS plastic pieces snap together easily. Dual-color molding creates stunning transparent eyes and glowing  dramatic color effects.
14 strategic joint points enable dynamic poses. Special C-grip hands and shoulder connection points for secure weapon holding.
Switch between three battle modes with the Circle Arms weapon. Transform from Combat Sword to Power Claw to Sky Bow, plus a 360° rotating Flash Blade.

Build your dream team with multiple versions of Trigger, fan-favorite heroes like Tiga, Z, and Ribut, plus awesome villains including Tartarus and Gazort. Hunt for the rare secret figure (1:27 ratio).
Safe ABS plastic parts snap together easily, designed for ages 9+ with no tools needed.
Compact 50x95mm figure fits easily in backpacks and display cases. Each box contains 9 surprise figures - great for sharing or collecting.

settings.heading: Power of Heroes: New Generation Legend
settings.text: Build, Battle, and Collect the Ultimate Ultraman Experience

settings.content_text: Got my box yesterday. Build quality is solid - no weak joints like some other buildable figures. The 50mm size works great for my shelf. Display stand is actually useful, not just a cheap add-on. Grabbed two more boxes today!
First time buying Ultraman stuff. Really happy with these - easy to build, look great on display. The 9-pack box is a good value. Already ordered another set for my brother.
Third box so far. Quality is consistent. No secret figure yet but the regular ones are good enough. The stands actually work, unlike cheaper brands. Will probably grab more when payday hits.
My son can build these on his own. Parts click together well, no tools needed. He's displayed all 9 on his desk. Just wish the weapons stayed in place better during play. Still worth buying.

Been collecting Ultraman for years. These capture the show designs really well. The joints are smooth, poses hold great. Love that they included Tartarus. Quick tip: the storage box fits perfectly in IKEA Kallax shelves.
First time trying these. Instructions are clear, pieces snap together well. Bit pricey but better quality than cheaper brands. The 14 points of articulation really make a difference.

settings.video_title_youtube: The Transformers of Fractured Space-Time?! Blokees Galaxy Version 04 Unboxings

settings.video_title_host: The Transformers of Fractured Space-Time?! Blokees Galaxy Version 04 Unboxings

settings.content_text: Got this for my nephew's birthday. He built all 9 in one day! The transparent parts and color matching are really nice. Good alternative to screen time. Will buy again for Christmas.

settings.rich_text:
• 21 premium parts snap together
  • 14 moving joints for action poses
  • Flexible design for combat stances

• Perfect 50x95mm display scale
  • Premium stand included
  • Ready to showcase anywhere

settings.title: Dynamic Action Design: Create Epic Battle Scenes!

settings.heading: Ultraman Showdown: Hero & Monster Blokees
settings.context: From Backpack to Battleground: Portable Heroes Ready for Action Anywhere

settings.heading: Detailed Manual
settings.context: We've included an easy-to-follow manual with your Blokees set. Find it in the product details section for all the tips and tricks you'll need.

settings.block_title: What are the odds of getting a secret figure?
settings.block_text: The production ratio is 1:27, meaning there's one secret figure for every 27 regular figures produced.

settings.block_title: What are the key features of each figure?
settings.block_text:
Each figure includes:

  • 21 buildable blocks
  • 14 movable joints
  • 50x95mm display size
  • Premium ABS/POM plastic construction
  • Detailed paint applications
  • Character-specific accessories

The collection includes:

  • Ultraman Trigger (Multiple Types)
  • Ultraman Tiga Sky Type
  • Ultraman Ribut
  • Ultraman Z Alpha Edge
  • Absolute Tartarus
  • Gazort
  • Secret Figure(s)
Designed for ages 9+. Uses safe materials but contains small parts not suitable for children under 3. Each figure takes 15-20 minutes to build. Parts snap together easily with no tools needed.

settings.block_title: Can I return or exchange opened surprise products?
settings.block_text: No, surprise products cannot be returned or exchanged once opened.

settings.block_title: What special features do the figures have?
settings.block_text:
Features include:

  • Dual-molded clear eyes
  • Interchangeable weapons
  • Special effect parts
  • Transform-able Circle Arms weapon
  • Character-specific display stands

The figures are made from:

  • ABS environmentally friendly plastic
  • POM plastic for joints
  • Premium paint applications
No, these come in complete 9-figure boxes only to maintain the surprise element.

settings.block_title: When will single Ultraman figures figures be sold separately?
settings.block_text: Currently, we offer the 9-figure Surprise Set Box. We're exploring different options for future releases and will announce any updates as soon as we can. Stay tuned for Blokees!
